casebody.data:
ST. PAUL FIRE AND MARINE INSURANCE COMPANY Plaintiff—Appellee v. Kenneth L. JONES, M.D., et al.; Defendants Paintsville Hospital Company, doing business as Paul B. Hall Regional Medical Center; Health Management Associates, Inc. Defendants—Appellants No. 00-6738. United States Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. June 19, 2002.

Before COLE and GILMAN, Circuit Judges; MILLS, District Judge.*

The Honorable Richard Mills, United States District Judge for the Central District of Illinois, sitting by designation.

ORDER

This cause having come on to be heard upon the record, the briefs and the oral argument of the parties, and upon due consideration thereof,

The court finds that no prejudicial error intervened in the judgment and proceed*287ings in the district court, and it is therefore ORDERED that said judgment be and it hereby is affirmed.
